title: Nothing New In Loot
body: So there was this orange circle that appeared on loot. That means that there is something new. However, when I clicked on it there was nothing new. Why is this happening?

replies.body: Hey there, I'm not sure what you mean exactly.  I did look into this for you, and it does look like a recent mastery chest had an extra chest within it for you which is pretty awesome.  Not sure if that helps, but let me know!
